snippet: At least 38 people were killed in the eastern town of Qubbah, the latest turn of a cycle of retaliatory killings.
abstract: Islamic State branch in Derna, Libya, claims responsibility for three car bombs in town of Qubbah, saying attacks are revenge for killings of Muslims in town.
lead_paragraph: At least 38 people were killed in the eastern town of Qubbah, the latest turn of a cycle of retaliatory killings.

headline.main: Ties to Islamic State Cited by Group in Libya Attacks
headline.print_headline: Ties to Islamic State Cited by Group in Libya Attacks
